alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Morgan and north central Washington Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 119 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Midway, or 11 miles west of Akron, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
